chart_description: This chart displays the rate of IPv6 neighbor messages exchanged per second.

dimension_descriptions.InAdvertisements: The rate at which IPv6 neighbors advertise their presence to the monitored system.
dimension_descriptions.InSolicits: The rate at which the monitored system solicits for IPv6 neighbors.
dimension_descriptions.OutAdvertisements: The rate at which the monitored system advertises its presence to its IPv6 neighbors.
dimension_descriptions.OutSolicits: The rate at which the monitored system solicits for IPv6 neighbors to connect.
